ValidationRule.description: Certain Loss Reasons require additional detail.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Loss_Reason__c ,'Competition'), ISPICKVAL( Loss_Reason__c ,'Service Concerns'), (ISPICKVAL( Loss_Reason__c ,'No Bid') && ISPICKVAL(Sub_Loss_Reason__c,'Other') ) ) , ISBLANK( Loss_Reason_Detail__c ) )
&& !$Permission.Ignore_All_VR && !$Permission.Ignore_Opp_VR
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Loss Reason Detail is required for the Lost Reason and/or Sub Lost Reason you have selected. For example: if selecting Competition please enter the competitor's name or 'Unknown'.
